alert.note: Alert for Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Camden, west central Pasquotank, northwestern Perquimans, southeastern Hertford, southeastern Gates and northwestern Chowan Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elizabeth City to near Chapanoke to Harrellsville. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth City, Camden, Ryland, Harrellsville, Tyner, Indiantown, Hobbsville, Belvidere, Belcross, Burnt Mills, Gliden, Newsome Store, Arrowhead Beach, Peach, Whiteston, Parkville, Nicanor, Icaria, Sign Pine and Spences Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans
